hibernate-mapping.query: update Licenseeclasspracticegroup a set a.effectiveFromDate = (select b.newEffectiveFromDate from LicenseeclasspracticegroupApprovals b where b.pk=:approvalPk) where a.pk=(select b.licenseeclasspracticegroupPk from LicenseeclasspracticegroupApprovals b where b.pk=:approvalPk)
select count(*) from LicenseeclasspracticegroupApprovals b where b.pk=:approvalPk) where a.pk=(select b.licenseeclasspracticegroupPk from LicenseeclasspracticegroupApprovals b where b.pk=:approvalPk)

INSERT INTO Licenseeclasspracticegroup (licenseeFk,isPrimary,effectiveFromDate,effectiveToDate,classPracticeGroupFk) select licenseeFk,newIsPrimary,newEffectiveFromDate,newEffectiveToDate,newClassPracticeGroupFk from LicenseeclasspracticegroupApprovals where pk =:primaryKey
